function ERU_EP05_10()
    -- .承-1【2月第1週】「予期せぬ終わりと絶望と」
    SaveData.Title = "予期せぬ終わりと絶望と"

    -- //BG：メインストリート
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav",0)

    MSG([[It's been two months since Hermes Himegami stopped appearing at the academy. Unsettling rumors had begun to circulate at Yuriai Private Academy.
エルメスさんが学園に姿を見せなくなって二ヶ月。 百合愛学園では不穏なウワサが流れ始めていた。]])

    MSG([[It seemed that Nemesia Himegami was scheming to enforce coeducation at the board of directors meeting.
姫神ネメシアさんが理事会で、共学を断行しようと暗躍しているらしい。]])

    MSG([[She, who had not shown any notable moves until then, seemed to be panicking over Marika Ikusa's awakening and Hermes Himegami's troubles.
それまで目立つ動きを見せてこなかった彼女も、マリカ姉さんの目覚めやエルメスさんの不調で焦っているようだ。]])

    MSG([[Since then, I've been trying in every way to find a way to meet Hermes Himegami, but I haven't found one.
ボクはアレから、何とかしてエルメスさんに会える方法を探しているものの、見つからない。]])

    MSG([[Because the situation was so serious, I couldn’t rely on others, and I kept just standing by helplessly.
事情が深刻なだけに仲間に頼るワケにもいかず、手をこまぬく状況ばかりが続いていた。]])

    -- //BG：1-A教室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014aa")
    -- //BU：リラ（悲しみ）、ヒユ（悲しみ）、ウラン（悲しみ）、モブ女子生徒×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_RIR07da")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB09aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,850,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(45,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(45,-850,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(40,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(40,500,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(35,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(35,-500,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(30,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(30,-200,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(25,"BU_MOB08aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(25,200,0)
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[Even in the daily strategy meetings, no good ideas came up. Gradually, a bad atmosphere began to spread among us Erika faction.
連日続く作戦会議でもなかなか妙案が浮かばない。
    　徐々にボクたちエリカ派の間には、よくない空気が流れ始めていた。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(45,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(40,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(35,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(30,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(25,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：マリカ（通常）、ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,830,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,630,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0063.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
通常 "It looks like things aren’t going very well."
通常
    「あまり芳しくない状況みたいだね」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2314.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
驚き "Marika-nee-san?"
驚き
    「マリカ姉さん？」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[But then Marika Ikusa and the others appeared.
だけどそこにマリカ姉さんたちが現れた。]])

    MSG([[She climbed onto the teacher’s podium and began talking to everyone while writing on the blackboard.
姉さんは教壇に上がったかと思うと、黒板に文字を書きながらみんなに語りかけていく。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0064.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
笑顔 "Hey, everyone, do you know that Hermes-chan actually has special circumstances? Today, let’s study about Hermes-chan together."
笑顔
    「ねえ、みんなはエルメスちゃんが実は特別な事情を抱えた子だってことは知ってるかな？　今日は私と一緒に、エルメスちゃんについて勉強しちゃおう」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2315.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
焦り "Nee-san! What exactly are you planning to talk about!?"
焦り
    「ね、姉さん！　一体何を話すつもりなの！？」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[On the blackboard was written the phrase ‘Dual Personality.’ She was about to explain the truth with a surprisingly light tone.
黒板には『二層人格』という文字。
    　とても軽いノリで、事の真相を話し出そうとしている。]])

    MSG([[I, of course, hurriedly stopped Marika-nee-san.
ボクは当然、慌ててマリカ姉さんを止めた。]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0065.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
笑顔 "Why can’t I talk about it?"
笑顔
    「どうして話しちゃダメなの？」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2316.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
真剣 "B-because of the situation. We can’t drag everyone into this trouble irresponsibly."
真剣
    「だ、だって事情が事情だもの。皆さんを悪戯に巻き込むことなんてできないよ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0066.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
真剣 "...We’re not dragging them in. We’re borrowing everyone’s strength instead of bearing it all alone."
真剣
    「……巻き込むんじゃないよ。一人で抱え込まずに、みんなのチカラを借りるの」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2317.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
驚き "Everyone’s... strength?"
驚き
    「みんなの……チカラを」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0067.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
笑顔 "I made the mistake of bearing it all alone. I don’t want Mina-chan to make the same mistake as me."
笑顔
    「私は一人で抱え込んで失敗しちゃったからね。ミナちゃんに、私と同じ失敗はしてもらいたくないの」]])

    MSG([[The overwhelming force in Marika-nee-san’s words made me retreat sheepishly.
マリカ姉さんの有無を言わさない迫力に、ボクはすごすごと引き下がる。]])

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[Then, Nee-san began explaining the detailed plan to the whole class.
それから姉さんは、クラスのみんなに詳細な作戦を説明し始めた。]])

    MSG([[…
…]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG014aa")
    -- //BU：マリカ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask007",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0068.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
笑顔 "...So that’s why. I’m sorry, but I’d be happy if everyone could join in<sprite="Emoji" name="note">"
笑顔
    「……というワケ。申し訳ないけれど、みんなにもお付き合いいただけたら嬉しいな<sprite="Emoji" name="note">」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2318.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
焦り "T-that kind of plan! Risking coeducation for my sake is unthinkable!"
焦り
    「そ、そんな作戦！　私のためなんかに共学化の危険を冒すなんて！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[The plan Marika-nee-san talked about was so bold that I couldn’t help but protest.
マリカ姉さんの語った作戦内容があまりにも大胆過ぎて、思わず抗議の声をあげてしまった。]])

    MSG([[Indeed, it would inevitably drag Hermes Himegami into the spotlight. But regardless of success or failure, it would involve the whole of Yuriai Private Academy.
確かに、否が応でもエルメスさんを、表舞台に引きずり出すことができる。 でもそれは、成否に関わらず、百合愛学園全体を巻き込んでしまう内容。]])

    MSG([[Above all, in the worst case, it could rapidly accelerate the introduction of coeducation.
何より最悪の場合、共学化が一気に進行してしまう恐れまであるんだ。]])

    MSG([[I could never accept that. I was firmly opposed.
とても容認などできない。
    　断固反対だ。]])

    MSG([[Marika-nee-san calmly rebutted my words.
マリカ姉さんは平然とした顔で、ボクの言葉に反論する。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",200,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0069.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
通常 "Look around. Everyone else has already made up their minds to go along with your selfishness from the start."
通常
    「周りを見てみなよ。他のみんなは初めから、あなたのワガママに付き合う覚悟だよ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：リラ（ウインク）、ヒユ（笑顔）、モブ女子生徒×いっぱい
    -- //BU：ウラン（笑顔）、ダリア（笑顔）、モブ女子生徒×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_RIR07ia")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-250,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,250,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(40,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(40,850,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(45,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(45,-850,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(35,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(35,450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(30,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(30,-450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(25,"BU_MOB08aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(25,0,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[Looking around the classroom, it seemed the whole class nodded in unison at Marika-nee-san’s words.
教室を見渡すと、クラスのみんなが息を揃えたみたいに、マリカ姉さんの言葉にうなずいた。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2319.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
驚き "E-everyone..."
驚き
    「み、皆さん……」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[I see. Once again, I was about to bear it all alone and make the wrong choice.
そうか。
    　ボクはまた、一人で抱え込んで、選択を間違えかけていた。]])

    MSG([[I had just realized this when I tried to sneak into the Himegami residence to save Armeria-san.
アルメリアさんを救いに姫神邸へと潜入しようとした時に、思い知ったばかりじゃないか。]])

    MSG([[The people who support me aren’t just my family. In tough times, it’s okay to rely on friends and everyone around you.
自分を支えてくれる存在は家族だけじゃない。
    　苦しい時には、友達に、周りのみんなに頼っていいんだ。]])

    MSG([[The greatest weapon I’ve gained this past year is the bond with everyone at this academy.
ボクがこの一年間で得た最大の武器は、この学園のみんなとの絆、なのだから。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2320.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
真剣 "No matter what happens, I want to save Hermes-san. Everyone, please lend me your strength!"
真剣
    「私は……何があってもエルメスさんを救いたい。皆さん、どうかチカラを貸してください！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(25,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(30,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(35,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(40,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(45,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0070.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
笑顔 "Of course. Now, let’s rescue her together. Our important friend here at Yuriai Private Academy."
笑顔
    「当然でしょ？　さぁ、私たちで救い出しましょう。この百合愛学園の、大切な仲間を」]])

    MSG([[Thus, I steeled myself to shake up the entire Yuriai Private Academy in order to save the person I care about most.
こうしてボクは、自分の大切なヒトを救うために、百合愛学園全体を振り回す覚悟を固めるのであった。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_11")
end
